turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how may i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a medium hot coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, where do you want to place this order at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. and did you want any cream or milk in your hot coffee.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can I get soy milk and honey?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: i've written that down. anything else for you?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: awesome. so to confirm, you would like a medium hot coffee with soy milk and honey from peet's.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what peet's did you want me to place this order at?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: cool, let me order it for you... before i do.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, the order has been placed.
